data.name: Elf Enchanter: Arousing Anima
data.detailed_description:
Check this out

https://store.steampowered.com/app/562350/


About the Game

An insecure support mage adventures with a spear-wielding dark elf, defeating slime monsters.

One day, he accidentally casts a monster-taming spell on his companion, making her submissive and obedient. The following days are full of trouble, awkward situations, and sexual tension.

Will this accident drive them apart, or bring them closer?

----------

Elf Enchanter: Arousing Anima is a visual novel game where you play as Roy the mage. When your companion Miriel comes under your control, will you take advantage of her, or try to salvage your friendship?

The game features two main ending routes, with lovingly produced erotic scenes presented in full HD, accompanied by an original soundtrack and full English voicing for Miriel, the game's heroine.

data.short_description: Fight slimes with a dark elf, accidentally hypnotize her, and have sexy encounters in an erotic visual novel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: MacOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

subs.option_text: Elf Enchanter: Arousing Anima - Commercial License - 21₴

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features sexual content including mind control, dubious consent, tentacles, and more. Player discretion is advised.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
